result.execSummary:
The defendant Joshua D Cloud #295287 was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Joshua D Cloud #295287 is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Joshua D Cloud #295287 was found guilty of Battery to Law Enforcement Officers, Fire Fighters or Commission Wardens, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.20(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Joshua D Cloud  #295287 in court, in custody with attorney Amanda K. Riek.  Christine Marie Genda appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Rights/Elements, Defendant pleads no contest to Ct. 1, Judgment to be entered, Ct. 2, 3, 4, 5 dismissed, Court withholds sentence, probation 3 years, consecutive to Eau Claire County Case Nos. 06 CF 398, 06 CF 645, Sauk County Case No. 09 CF 119 and Winnebago County Case, 12 CM 754,  $518.00 costs, defendant to comply w/any conditions by DOC, defendant to provide DNA Sample

Adam Raabe of the State Public Defender office Cliff Burdon appeared for the State of Wisconsin. $750 cash bond with not possess/consume alcohol, no contact with victims, S.P. & C.V. and felony conds.
